data.name: MSG6001
data.value: Cannot register "Issue invoice timing (months)" with the number over 60 months.

data.name: MSG6002
data.value: The combination of specified Billing client code and billing office already exists in billing customer code: {0}

data.name: MSG6003
data.value: The combination of specified contract no./Project code and billing customer code already exists in billing code: {0}

data.name: MSG6004
data.value: Billing type, {0} already exists in list.

data.name: MSG6005
data.value: Please specify at least 1 billing type.

data.name: MSG6006
data.value: Payment method is Bank transfer (Other account). Please register bank transfer account information.

data.name: MSG6007
data.value: Payment method is Credit card. Please register credit card information.

data.name: MSG6008
data.value: Cannot remove {0}.

data.name: MSG6009
data.value: If Payment term is less than 2, it needs to acquire approval.

data.name: MSG6010
data.value: Adjust ending date of billing period cannot be the date before Last billing date.

data.name: MSG6011
data.value: Last payment condition changing date cannot be a future date.

data.name: MSG6012
data.value: There is inconsistency in continuity of "Last date" and "Date before changing 1-4".

data.name: MSG6013
data.value: Start date of billing period of the first billing history of billing basic cannot be registered before contract's start operation date.

data.name: MSG6014
data.value: Billing period (from) must be the same date as Approve contract date or after.

data.name: MSG6015
data.value: After registering, all editions except ‘Special careful flag’ will be disabled until special careful flag is unchecked.

data.name: MSG6016
data.value: Payment method is changed from "Bank transfer (Other account)" to others. Bank transfer account information will be deleted, so please confirm.

data.name: MSG6017
data.value: Payment method is changed from "Credit card" to others. Credit card information will be deleted, so please confirm.

data.name: MSG6018
data.value: The number over 60 months is registered in Payment term. Please confirm whether it is mistake or not.

data.name: MSG6019
data.value: The number over 12 months is registered in credit term. Please confirm whether it is mistake or not.

data.name: MSG6020
data.value: Billing of continuous fee will be stopped by this change. Please confirm whether there is no problem.

data.name: MSG6021
data.value: Billing flag is changed, so billing of continuous fee will be issued. Please confirm whether there is no problem.

data.name: MSG6022
data.value: Please be sure to edit contract data in order not to be inconsistent with service fee.

data.name: MSG6023
data.value: You do not have a permission to cancel billing detail.

data.name: MSG6024
data.value: Issued billing detail and cancelled billing detail must be same billing type.

data.name: MSG6025
data.value: Expected issue/bank transfer (other account) date cannot be in the past.

data.name: MSG6026
data.value: Specified expected issue/bank transfer (other account) date is not the bank transfer (other account) date set in master.

data.name: MSG6027
data.value: Specified expected issue/bank transfer (other account) date is not the credit card transfer date set in master.

data.name: MSG6028
data.value: Expected bank transfer (other account) date has already generated bank transfer (other account) bank file.

data.name: MSG6029
data.value: Expected bank transfer (other account) date has already generated credit card transfer file.

data.name: MSG6030
data.value: Billing period (from) must be the same date as Start operation date or after.

data.name: MSG6031
data.value: Billing period ({0}-{1}) must be continuous period with existing billing detail's billing period.

data.name: MSG6032
data.value: Billing period ({0}-{1}) must not be overlapped with exiting billing detail's billing period.

data.name: MSG6033
data.value: Cannot register because there will be no billing detail from 'Start date of billing period' of the first billing history.

data.name: MSG6034
data.value: Cannot create billing detail before 'Start date of billing period' of the first billing history.

data.name: MSG6035
data.value: This billing detail was issued invoice and the invoice has more one billing detail. Do you want to continue cancellation?

data.name: MSG6036
data.value: The adjust-on-next-period amount is registered in this billing basic. Please check whether there is a mistake or not, or whether it's necessary to edit or delete the adjust-on-next-period amount or not.

data.name: MSG6037
data.value: Adjust billing period (from) must be the same date as Start operation date or after.

data.name: MSG6038
data.value: Adjust billing period (to) must be the same date as Last billing date or before.

data.name: MSG6039
data.value: Are you sure to change adjust-on-next-period data?

data.name: MSG6040
data.value: Billing customer does not exist.

data.value: Billing basic does not exist.

data.value: Billing detail does not exist.

data.name: MSG6043
data.value: Invoice does not exist.

data.name: MSG6044
data.value: Cannot switch to bank transfer (other account)/credit card because payment method of billing basic is not bank transfer (other account)/credit card.

data.name: MSG6045
data.value: Please switch to bank transfer (other account)/credit card by invoice because billing detail is already issued invoice and have more than 1 detail in invoice.

data.name: MSG6046
data.value: Cannot switch to bank transfer (other account)/credit card because billing detail is not payment status as 00 -unissued invoice or 01-unpaid invoice and only 1 detail in invoice.

data.name: MSG6047
data.value: Cannot stop bank transfer (other account)/credit card because billing detail is already issued invoice and have more than 1 detail in invoice.

data.name: MSG6048
data.value: Cannot stop bank transfer (other account)/credit card because billing detail is not payment status as 04 -unissued invoice or 03-unpaid invoice and only 1 detail in invoice.

data.name: MSG6049
data.value: Cannot change expected issue date/bank transfer (other account) date because billing detail is not unpaid and unissued invoice.

data.name: MSG6050
data.value: Cannot switch to bank transfer (other account)/credit card because there is any billing code which has different account information in bank transfer (other account) information/credit card information.

data.name: MSG6051
data.value: Cannot switch to bank transfer (other account)/credit card because billing detail is not payment status as 01-unpaid invoice.

data.name: MSG6052
data.value: Cannot stop bank transfer (other account)/credit card because billing detail is not payment status 03-unpaid invoice.

data.name: MSG6053
data.value: Cannot cancel billing detail of intermediate term.

data.value: Please specify at least 1 billing detail to cancel.

data.name: MSG6055
data.value: Please issue at least 1 billing detail.

data.value: Billing basic: {0} is careful special. Cannot edit billing basic, billing detail and invoice information.

data.value: Contract no. does not exist.

data.value: The total of registered billing amount must be equal to the amount of last service fee.

data.value: Billing detail in invoice must have same tax rate.

data.value: This contract must be start operation.

data.value: Billing period (from-to) must not duplicate with existing billing detail.

data.name: MSG6064
data.value: Cannot issue sale invoice because process management status is not 2: Stock-out or 4: Installation completed but not accepted.
